channel.title: How do i make Buy X?
channel.description:
i tryed searching like 5 times all i found was similar questions that werent answered
I need to know how to add Buy x to my server, I have a client if i need one so dont post saying"you need a client" Post something that will help me
:) thanks

item.title: How do i make Buy X?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

This bit is CLIENT Sided, so In your client files, open up class9.java, and search for:

class9.aStringArray225[j2] = class30_sub2_sub2.method415();

And below it add these:

if (class9.anInt250 == 3900) { class9.aStringArray225[4] = "Buy X"; } if (class9.anInt250 == 3823) { class9.aStringArray225[4] = "Sell X"; }

Save & compile your client.

This next bit is SERVER Sided, so in your Server files, open up client.java and search for:

case 208:

And under ‘int EnteredAmount = inStream.readDWord();’, add these:

if (XinterfaceID == 3823) { sellItem(XremoveID, XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); } if (XinterfaceID == 3900) { buyItem(XremoveID, XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); }

Now Save, compile and run, both your client, and the server, then It should work.

Read full topic
